core_principles: Clarity over Decoration: Every pixel must serve the conversion goal.
Trust through Precision: Solar is technical; the design must feel engineered, not just painted.
Golden Warmth: Use yellow to evoke the sun and energy, but anchor it with stark white and deep charcoal to avoid the 'cheap course seller' look.
Human Connection: Use real imagery of homes and people, not abstract 3D solar blobs.

primary.description: Golden Yellow - Used for primary CTAs and highlights. Energetic but grounded.

secondary.description: Deep Charcoal - Used for headings and strong borders. Provides the 'engineered' contrast.

background.description: Pure White for clarity. Very subtle gray for section separation.

border.description: Soft gray borders that turn golden on hover.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Manrope' font for headings and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for body. Use Google Fonts.
The primary CTA MUST open a Shadcn Dialog (Modal) containing the Lead Form.
The Lead Form must NOT pay. It must collect Name, Email, Phone, and redirect to WhatsApp API link with a pre-filled message.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the 'How it Works' section to avoid a boring list.
The Pricing Cards must be prominent. The middle card (R$ 79,90) should be highlighted as 'Best Value' with a golden border and scale transform.
Admin Dashboard: keep it clean. Sidebar navigation + large data table for leads. Use Shadcn Table component.
Do NOT use dark mode toggles. Force the app to stay in Light Mode as per constraints.
Ensure the WhatsApp redirect URL format is: `https://wa.me/55[NUMBER]?text=[ENCODED_MESSAGE]`.
